biography: Hailing from Hirsala Golf, Jarkko, also known as "Bailando," is a seasoned veteran of the Hector Trophée, having competed in the prestigious invitational since 2022.

Jarkko's consistent presence in this tournament speaks volumes about his skill and dedication to the game.  His impressive track record includes a remarkable victory in the 2023 Hector Trophée, where he not only secured the coveted Hector Trophée itself but also took home the individual Victor trophy, a testament to his exceptional performance that year.

While Jarkko hasn't yet replicated the success of his 2023 triumph, his past appearances, including participation in the 2024 and 2025 editions, show his commitment to this event and his continuing pursuit of excellence on the course.  He's certainly one to watch as he looks to add to his impressive trophy collection.
